official_title: A bill to designate Jackson, Perry, and Randolph Counties in Illinois as a single metropolitan statistical area.

summary.text: Directs that the Illinois counties of Jackson, Perry, and Randolph be designated a single metropolitan statistical area by the Director of the Office of Management and Budget.

titles.title: A bill to designate Jackson, Perry, and Randolph Counties in Illinois as a single metropolitan statistical area.
